newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Jan 19.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Jan 19.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- The Islamic Development Bank undertakes a study to examine proposals for setting up shipping links between Islamic states.
- Sheep prices rise in Saudi Arabia as Haj season approaches. Around two million Moslems perform pilgrimage at the two holy shrines in Mecca and Medina.
- Saudi Arabian Airlines to resume flights to Beirut from February.
- Three technology colleges to be constructed in Saudi Arabia at a cost of 150 million riyals.
- Saudi committee donates around three million riyals to needy people in the Eastern province of Saudi Arabia.
